DOC.brief_title: The Chinese University Hong Kong Early Arthritis Study
DOC.detailed_description: This 24-week open-label randomize study . Forty patient randomly assign receive either combination infliximab plus Methotrexate ( MTX ) ( n=20 ) Methotrexate ( MTX ) alone ( n=20 ) All participant receive oral Methotrexate ( MTX ) , start 7.5 mg/week . In patient persistent tender swollen joint , dose escalate graduated manner ( 2.5 mg/week every 1-2 week ) 15 mg/week week 4 20 mg/week week 8 Patients combination group receive infliximab 3mg/kg week 0 , 2 , 6 every 8 week thereafter . Comprehensive assessment make week 0 , 12 , 24 .
